My Work

02

Vocal Program

An interactive language learning website and application. Utilizes AI voice recreation and advanced speech recognition, to aid learners in speaking.

Lazy Love App

A modern version of a Messaging app previously created by my Father. I succesfully rebuilt it in Flutter and am in the final stages of launching.

LiftView

A sleek and modern Gym managment system, built to aid owners in collecting data and optimizing their ecosystem. Can also be used as a social platform for users.
